summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Inspecteur Auto platform bug fixes. All 3 critical bugs have been verified as fixed: 1) Buttons on /programme-detaille are now clickable and navigate to /register, 2) Admin pages are accessible after refresh without redirect to login, 3) Pre-registration form with phone field works correctly and admin callback status update functions properly.
critical_code_review_comments: Code quality is good - Button components properly use onClick with navigate() instead of anchor tags
AuthContext correctly implements loading state with token verification on mount
ProtectedRoute shows spinner during auth check preventing premature redirects
Pre-registration form properly validates phone field (minimum 10 characters)
seed_data_creation: Created test prospects during API testing with unique emails
context_for_next_testing_agent: All 3 bugs from the original request have been fixed and verified: 1) /programme-detaille buttons work correctly with Button component and navigate(), 2) Admin pages persist auth on refresh due to AuthContext loading state, 3) Phone field in pre-registration form works and admin callback status update API functions correctly. Backend has 13 passing tests covering auth, pre-registration, and admin endpoints.

programme_detaille_buttons.details: Buttons are clickable and navigate to /register correctly. Using Button component with onClick and navigate() instead of anchor tags.

admin_page_refresh.details: Admin pages (/admin/seo, /admin/pre-registrations) remain accessible after page refresh. AuthContext loading state prevents premature redirect to login.

pre_registration_phone_field.details: Phone field present in form with data-testid='phone-input'. Validation requires minimum 10 characters. Backend correctly rejects empty phone numbers.

admin_callback_status_update.details: API endpoint PATCH /api/admin/pre-registrations/{id}/callback correctly updates callback_status and callback_notes. UI modal works correctly.
